name: TKSmartCardUserInteractionDelegate
desc: The interface implemented by a Smart Card user interaction delegate to handle user interaction events.

items.name: func characterEntered(in: TKSmartCardUserInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a valid character has been entered.

items.name: func correctionKeyPressed(in: TKSmartCardUserInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a correction key has been pressed.

items.name: func validationKeyPressed(in: TKSmartCardUserInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the validation key has been pressed, indicating the end of PIN entry.

items.name: func invalidCharacterEntered(in: TKSmartCardUserInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an invalid character has been entered.

items.name: func oldPINRequested(in: TKSmartCardUserInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the old PIN needs to be entered.

items.name: func newPINRequested(in: TKSmartCardUserInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the new PIN needs to be entered.

items.name: func newPINConfirmationRequested(in: TKSmartCardUserInteraction)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the new PIN needs to be re-entered for confirmation.
